author: foconer
msg: Added condition where it will only execute adding the core's javadocs api if it exist.

author: jeremias
msg: Introduced a flag to tell the page breaking to operate in auto-height mode, i.e. no overflows can happen. This disables the overflow warnings when footnote-separators are defined. They don't have an explicit height.

author: crogers
msg: Added a missing "ValicateURL" annotation type to the list of supported page flow AnnotationTypes. This fixes an APT warning: "Annotation types without processors: [org.apache.beehive.netui.pageflow.annotations.Jpf.ValidateURL]"

author: taylor
msg: use portlet name if portlet display name not avail
